Text: I miss David Tennant playing the Doctor.
same. miss tennant, new doctor is meh
Same. Matt Smith sucks, yet I still watch the show 'cause everything else about it rocks. =P

I am from the old school. Grew up watching Tom Baker. At first I hated Peter.
David was great, but come on people! Give Matt the chance he deserves! He IS the Doctor.

Subs are up:
http://www.addic7ed.com/serie/Doctor_Who/5/14/A_Christmas_Carol
use google translator for your own language
and replace any - for -- after translating ;)

..Tom Baker is still the best Doctor ever after 47 years of Doctor Who! Yes, Peter was ok too. ;-)  Tennant was good, but I don't miss him one bit. Matt has embraced the character well in his 1st season he IS THE DOCTOR. Its the nature of the show, but I guess you could always go watch Torchwood or Sarah Jane(K-9 FOREVER!!) instead if he is not to your liking. LOL!
Thanks for this. SOUND works FINE. Doctor who is Doctor Who. Either get used to the new Doctor's or stop watching the show.

Long time fan, and I have to agree with Llamaduck. If they would dump Matt Smith and keep Karen Gillan they would have a much better show.

BTW, thanks for the upload and the massive seeding.
Overrated, over budgeted, load of old bollocks that needs another Jon Pertwee. A Dr who sends you to behind the sofa...

David Tennant is the funniest Doctor by far. Matt is a tosser and the Doctor is a respectable and middle aged man, not some 20yo punk that sucked a lot of cock to get into the position. He's by no means of any use as a Doctor. The Doctor is amazing. Matt sucks!
